casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. OMNI MANOR, INC.
v.
INDUS. COMM. 2019-1134 Supreme Court of Ohio. September 4, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MEDIATION MATTERS

The court refers the following case to mediation under S.Ct.Prac.R. 19.01 and stays all filing deadlines until further order of this court. The court will not issue any decision on the merits of the case until mediation has concluded.
